name: Computer Science
description: Study of algorithms, programming, data structures, and software development. Covers theoretical foundations and practical applications of computing.

name: Software Engineering
description: Focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software systems using engineering principles and methodologies.

name: Information Technology
description: Focus on managing and supporting computer systems, networks, and information security in organizations.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Design, construction, and maintenance of physical infrastructure like roads, bridges, and buildings.

name: Architecture
description: Design of buildings and structures, combining aesthetics, functionality, and engineering principles.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Study of electrical systems, electronics, and power distribution for various applications.

name: Business Administration
description: Learn management, finance, marketing, and organizational leadership to run successful businesses.

name: Economics
description: Study of economic theory, policy, market analysis, and resource allocation in society.

name: Accounting
description: Study of financial record-keeping, auditing, taxation, and financial reporting for organizations.

name: Marketing
description: Learn strategies for promoting products and services, consumer behavior, branding, and market research.

name: Finance
description: Study of investment management, financial markets, corporate finance, and financial planning.

name: Human Resources Management
description: Management of recruitment, employee relations, training, and organizational development.

name: Law
description: Study of legal systems, principles, and practices for justice and governance.

name: Fine Arts
description: Creative expression through painting, sculpture, music, and performance arts.

name: Graphic Design
description: Visual communication through typography, imagery, and layout for print and digital media.

name: Education
description: Training for teaching, curriculum development, and educational leadership.

name: Communications
description: Study of media, journalism, public relations, and effective communication strategies.

name: Culinary Arts
description: Professional training in cooking techniques, food preparation, menu planning, and kitchen management.

name: Agriculture
description: Study of farming, crop production, animal husbandry, and sustainable food systems.

name: Mathematics
description: Study of mathematical theory, analysis, statistics, and computational methods.

name: Physics
description: Study of matter, energy, and the fundamental laws governing the physical universe.

name: Chemistry
description: Study of matter, chemical reactions, and molecular structures in various applications.

name: Biology
description: Study of living organisms, ecosystems, genetics, and life processes.

name: Medicine
description: Medical training for diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases and injuries.

name: Nursing
description: Healthcare training focused on patient care, medication administration, and clinical support.

name: Pharmacy
description: Study of medications, drug therapy, pharmacology, and pharmaceutical care.

name: Public Health
description: Focus on disease prevention, health promotion, and improving community health outcomes.
